item.title: Expecting on the Front Lines: Motherhood in Ukraine’s Military
item.description: Pregnant Ukrainian soldiers say they are fighting for the future of their country and for their children.

item.title: How China Influences Elections in America’s Biggest City
item.description: The Chinese consulate in Manhattan has mobilized community groups to defeat candidates who don’t fall in line with the authoritarian state.

item.title: German Prosecutors Charge American With Attempted Spying for China
item.description: The authorities provided few details about the case, the latest in a series of apprehensions in Germany of potential Chinese spies.

item.title: France Summons U.S. Ambassador Charles Kushner Over Antisemitism Comments
item.description: The new American envoy, Charles Kushner, said that France was not doing enough to protect its Jewish citizens, a charge the government in Paris said i...

item.title: Four Journalists Among Those Killed in Israeli Strikes on Gaza Hospital, Officials Say
item.description: Gaza-based reporters said the four had worked for various international media outlets. The Israeli military confirmed its forces had struck the hospit...
